summary: Test suite for the Lightning Fabric library, including fixtures for isolated pytest environments and comprehensive tests for the command‑line interface, automatic connector configuration, core Fabric functionalities, and wrapper utilities across diverse hardware and cluster setups.
business_intent: Provide automated verification of Lightning Fabric’s correctness and robustness, ensuring that accelerator selection, strategy handling, distributed communication, model/optimizer setup, and utility wrappers work reliably on various devices and deployment environments.
